    Andrew C. W. Myers

    A person…

    • Somewhere

    I am a Predoctoral Research Fellow at the Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research working under the direction of José Ignacio Cuesta and Shoshana Vasserman. I previously worked with Andrew B. Hall in the Stanford Political Science Department.

    I graduated from St. Olaf College with a B.A. degree in Economics and Political Science in May, 2020.

    Andrew Myers
